title: Hextech Chests not added at endgame with S rank
body:
In my last games i quequed up with a premade, and in two occasions my premades got an S on champions on which i did not get it already, that i had already unlocked with free chests avaiable to be picked.

As far as i am aware i am not under any punishment ( as a matter of fact i have never got one). 

Should i write a ticket? Under which section? This seems too much unimportant to bother it as technical problem >_>

The matches were the ones with shen and sion, i can' t link the proper match because apparently the official match history is broken (?)

http://euw.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=decrit

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have already earned a chest while playing these champs due to others in your premade getting an S grade for a match. As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, these do count towards the one chest you can earn per champion per season.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for additional details. Let me know if you have any other questions.

When a premade friend gets an S for you to get a chest, you earn a chest for the champion you were playing, not the one your friend was playing. Since you were playing Shen and Sion, if you have already earned a chest for those 2 champions, then you cannot get a chest while playing as them, even if a premade friend gets an S on a different champion.

Ooooh :O always intended that i would get an S from my premade's champ.

Ty!
